variable.name: SUBJID
variable.description: Individual ID of subject

variable.name: RecruitSite
variable.description: Subject's recruitment site [Collected in Exam 0, WH- Whicap, DR- Dominican Republic,

variable.name: SEX
variable.description: Sex of subject

variable.name: Height
variable.description: Height of subject

variable.name: Weight
variable.description: Weight of subject

variable.name: Education
variable.description: Subject's educational level

variable.name: AAO
variable.description: Subject's age of disease onset

variable.name: AgeLastSeen
variable.description: Subject's age at last examination

variable.name: Smoking
variable.description: Subject's smoking status

variable.name: HeadInjury
variable.description: Subject's history of head injury

variable.name: Diabetes
variable.description: Subject's history of diabetes

variable.name: Hyperten
variable.description: Subject's history of hypertension

variable.name: Heart
variable.description: Subject's history of heart disease

variable.name: Stroke
variable.description: Subject's history of stroke

variable.name: APOE-A
variable.description: Subject's A allele value for Apolipoprotein E gene [Collected in Exam 0]

variable.name: APOE-B
variable.description: Subject's B allele value for Apolipoprotein E gene [Collected in Exam 0]

variable.name: BirthPlace
variable.description: Subject's country of birth [Collected in Exam 0, Dominican Republic, Puerto Rico, Other]

variable.name: FamilyHist_Available
variable.description: Subject has a family history of AD [Collected in Exam 0]

variable.name: StudyCategory
variable.description: Type of study subject is a part of [Collected in Exam 0, cohort, case/control, family,

variable.name: Visit
variable.description: Examination is initial or follow-up visit

variable.name: AFFECTION_STATUS
variable.description: Subject's Alzheimer's disease affection status

variable.name: CDR
variable.description: Subject's score on Clinical Dementia Rating Scale (Morris, JC)

variable.name: AgeAtEvaluation
variable.description: Subject's age at examination

variable.name: RecallTotal
variable.description: Subject's score on total recall from SRT (Buschke, H & Fuld, PA)

variable.name: DelayRecognition
variable.description: Subject's score on recognition test SRT (Buschke, H & Fuld, PA)

variable.name: Naming
variable.description: Subject's score on Boston Naming Test (Kaplan, E, Goodglass, H., Weintraub, S)

variable.name: Repetition
variable.description: Subject's score on Repetition from Boston Diagnostic Aphasia Examination (Goodlglass, H, Kaplan, E, Barresi, B.)

variable.name: Similarities
variable.description: Subject's score on Abstract Reasoning from WAIS (Wechsler, D)

variable.name: Identities_Oddities
variable.description: Subject's score on Identities/oddities from Mattis Dementia Rating Scale (Mattis, S)

variable.name: ColorTrails1
variable.description: Subject's percentile on Color Trails Test 1 Form A (D'Elia et. al.)

variable.name: ColorTrails2
variable.description: Subject's percentile on Color Trails Test 2 Form A (D'Elia et. al.)

variable.name: ADL
variable.description: Subject's score on Schwab and England Activities of Daily Living Scale (Schwab, JF, England, AC)

variable.name: SBP
variable.description: Subject's systolic blood pressure measured by Medtronix

variable.name: DBP
variable.description: Subject's diastolic blood pressure measured by Medtronix
